Author: Rachel#1921
Content: Hi , Hoping I can get some help as I have tried everything I can think of to get to my non working wallet. A bit of background....I rebooted my system after the coins were pulled out of my wallet and created a new agama verus wallet. I didn't know I had to pull out the existing funds. But either way I was not able to to access my wallet as it went blank and so I rebooted the system and created the new wallet . However my last address where the funds were pulled out I do not have the  seed phrase. I have the pin pasword.  Back in March I created Agama wallet and  moved my KMD coins into it and have the seed phrase. Then I moved them all out into my binance exchange. However, I decided to go back into KMD coin and bought a lot and went back to my wallet typing the seed phrase (not copying and pasting)...and it gave me a different address but I didn't realize that this address was not the same as my oriignial address. So I don't know what letter or space is dfifferent from my original seed phrase. I did a restore point and was able tto access the wallet with the pin word but then goes blank. I contacted the support team and they told me to try the pin file to move...tried that and still can't access my wallet in agama verus to get the seed word. I feel hopeless. Any help would be appreciated.

Author: rainbro7#4735
Content: Is there a reason why verus agama is safer than kmd Agama?

Author: rainbro7#4735
Content: Or is it simply because the bad actor was not part of the verus team?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000029932-agama-security-announcement

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: @rainbro7 the bad actors were not part of the komodo team either. Please read about what actually happened. This is and will happen to every coin project eventually unless they write 100% of their own code.

Author: rainbro7#4735
Content: Sorry, I meant contributed to the github

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Correct

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Verus Agama was forked from a older code base without this dependency

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: and thus did not have that issue

Author: rainbro7#4735
Content: Thank you KMD team. Great support. All my funds are now safe.

Content: üëçüèª

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: Verus agama uses the same wallet.dat so you will see your old address (in native) in light use same seed to send funds to new address.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
create a new address with Verus Agama. backup seed and address, login multiple times to ensure you get the right address each time.
login with old seed, activate each coin, send funds to the new address you created
